title: Optimize Ad for Mobile
description: A campaign's performance is poor on mobile devices. A manager needs to create a mobile-specific version of an ad.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a copy of the ad to be modified.

tasks.description: In the new ad, replace the landscape image with a vertical (9:16) image that is better suited for mobile screens.
Shorten the ad copy to be more concise and easier to read on a small screen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent edits the copy for mobile-first consumption.
